body_html: Just in case someone is still looking for original NMN paper implementation in PyTorch, here is my attempt on it: https://github.com/HarshTrivedi/nmn-pytorch. I am planning to add much more documentation in following 2 weeks to reproduce the results.
body_text: Just in case someone is still looking for original NMN paper implementation in PyTorch, here is my attempt on it: https://github.com/HarshTrivedi/nmn-pytorch. I am planning to add much more documentation in following 2 weeks to reproduce the results.
body: Just in case someone is still looking for original NMN paper implementation in PyTorch, here is my attempt on it: https://github.com/HarshTrivedi/nmn-pytorch. I am planning to add much more documentation in following 2 weeks to reproduce the results.
